text: Susan Roman (born April 12, 1957) is a Canadian voice actress and voice director, best known for voice acting the role of Lita/Sailor Jupiter in the Canada DiC (and later Cloverway/CWi) dub of the anime, Sailor Moon. She is one of the few voice actors to remain throughout the entire run of the Sailor Moon series. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Actors from Edmonton Category:Bloomsburg University of Pennsylvania alumni Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Living people Category:1957 births Category:Movie actors
title: Susan Roman
